basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in autumn and winter may take 2-3h sunlight, receive more light when leaves are dark green
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering
